name: MINTSWEEPER
description:
Hello, and welcome to MINTSWEEPER, a Kansas City Breath Mints themed version of the classic time waster Minesweeper.

How to play:

  • Left click on tiles to reveal what's underneath.
  • Some of the tiles have mints hidden under them. Uncovering these tiles will break the mint and end the game.
  • Some of the tiles have numbers underneath them. The number tells you how many mints are hidden among the adjacent tiles.
  • Right click a tile to place or remove a flag. Flags prevent tiles from being uncovered, and can be used to mark where mints are hiding.
  • The game is won when only tiles hiding mints remain.

Please refrain from middle clicking tiles (or shift clicking), and do not create any lore for Gun Bong. Thank you.
